content: Hi! I'm a master student at Guangzhou South Campus of Sun Yat-sen University. Is anyone in Guangzhou?
I'm an alumnus though I studied at the East Campus :) I only know that @张守信(Shouxin Zhang) (and another guy?) is from SUSTech, Shenzhen.

Junyan Xu said:

I'm an alumnus though I studied at the East Campus :) I only know that 张守信(Shouxin Zhang) (and another guy?) is from SUSTech, Shenzhen.

I'm in Shenzhen, too. Is there any offline event?

Junyan Xu said:

I'm an alumnus though I studied at the East Campus :) I only know that 张守信(Shouxin Zhang) (and another guy?) is from SUSTech, Shenzhen.

Oh, that "another guy" is me. I’m in Shenzhen, unfortunately no time to go to Guangzhou recently. If anyone in Shenzhen would like to meet, I’d be happy to meet offline!
